comment.author: 40460312@N08
comment._content: Wow, this is great.  Until I went hunting for photos by Mathew Brady, I had no idea the National Archives had put all these photos on Flickr.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Hi joeph57,
Thanks for the great feedback!  The National Archives regularly adds more content to our photostream on Flickr, including some more upcoming Mathew Brady photos, so be sure to check out our content often.

Mary
U.S. National Archives
